Detailed Description

Helper class for writing data to QTcpSocket.

Author:
Yuri 'Ree' Borisoff
Mailto: yuri.borisoff@gmail.com
Version:
1.0
Date:
2010-2010

Prepere data to write it to QTcpSocket. Perform writing in destructor. Uses Qt_4_4 version of data format
